title: v1.6.4.3 Minimize/Restore Bug Fixes
details:
Fixed 5 critical bugs in Quick Tab Manager minimize/restore:

1. Issue 2: UICoordinator.update() must check BOTH `quickTab.minimized` AND `quickTab.visibility?.minimized`
2. Issue 3: DestroyHandler.closeAll() emits `state:cleared`; UICoordinator has `reconcileRenderedTabs()` to destroy orphans
3. Issue 4: MinimizedManager stores position/size as IMMUTABLE SNAPSHOT in add() to prevent corruption
4. Issue 5: Use `isTabMinimizedHelper()` pattern: `tab.minimized ?? tab.visibility?.minimized ?? false`

Key pattern for minimized state detection:
```javascript
const isMinimized = Boolean(quickTab.minimized || quickTab.visibility?.minimized);
```
